name: test_e2e_with_logs[430_REDIR_BACKSLASH_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `REDIR_BACKSLASH_001` |
| **Name** | Backslash redirect |
| **Category** | OPEN_REDIRECT |
| **Subcategory** | backslash_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `redirect=//\evil.com`
- **Encoded**: `redirect%3D%2F%2F%5Cevil.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~16000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:43.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Redirect] Open redirect attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Redirect] Open redirect attempt detected test_id=REDIR_BACKSLASH_001-1772277103430-avu7jj pattern_id=REDIR_BACKSLASH_001 uri=/?q=redirect%3D%2F%2F%5Cevil.com client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Redirect] Open redirect attempt detected test_id=REDIR_BACKSLASH_001-1772277103430-avu7jj pattern_id=REDIR_BACKSLASH_001 uri=/?q=redirect%3D%2F%2F%5Cevil.com client=127.0.0.1
